```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
library(RCmodels)
data(V316_river)
f <- Q~W
bgplm.fit <- bplm(f,V316_river)
```

## Plotting examples

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bgplm.fit,type = 'rating_curve')
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bgplm.fit,type = 'beta')
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bgplm.fit,type = 'sigma_eps')
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bgplm.fit,type = 'residuals')
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bgplm.fit,type = 'histogram','hyperparameters')
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bgplm.fit,type = 'histogram','hyperparameters',transformed=T)
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bgplm.fit,type = 'histogram','a','b')
```
